## PopulatableLiquity.borrowZUSD() method

Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more ZUSD.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
borrowZUSD(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedLiquityTransaction<P, SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter        | Type                                   | Description                                                                    |
| ---------------- | -------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| amount           | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of ZUSD to borrow.                                                  |
| maxBorrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.populatedliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ borrowZUSD: amount }, maxBorrowingRate)

```
